page.title: 09St. Andrews Church:Shilton
page.content: The average congregation for{St {Andrews Church}is about{30 to 40.}At {Christmas and Easter}it rises to between{75 and 100. Shilton}doesn't have its own vicar so they share the {Rev.D.Scott}with{Bulkington}and{Ansty. Services alternate with{Ansty.}These consist of 5 hymns readings and the vicar's address. The{Rev.Scott}visits the sick and those with problems.There are 3 or 4 weddings a year.Baptisms are included in the morning service. { Mr. Andrews,}the churchwarden,is responsible for keeping the building in good order.He does his own maintenance when possible.Money for repairs is raised by church fetes. { Charlie A. Parker}is the towermaster. He is responsible for up to{14 {bellringers.}Bellringing is practised on{Fridays}from{7pm}to{9pm.
